overview: Private's The Private Gladiator is all set to make history with the biggest budget film yet made within the adult sector with Antonio Adamo directing a super-ambitious remake of the classic gladiator story. With twenty-six girls, including some of Private's hottest starlets; Rita Faltoyano, Lynn Stone, Sophie Evans, Petra Short and a host of horny new talent providing the hot sex and the part of Maxximus is played by Toni Ribas and the scheming emperor Commodus is portrayed by Frank Gunn!
title: The Private Gladiator
